mapper.select: select COUNT(aa.assoc_id) from (select concat(',',group_concat(`a`.`user_id` separator ','),',') AS user_id , a.`assoc_id`, a.sign from cus_user_assoc a where assoc_type='MONTH_REPORT_TARGET' GROUP BY a.`assoc_id`,sign ) aa where aa.user_id like CONCAT('%',CONCAT(',',#{beSentPeopleId},','),'%') and aa.assoc_id in (select id from cus_month_report where status!=146) and aa.sign is null

SELECT a.*, b.name as statusName, c.name as createByName, c.dept_id as createDeptId, d.name as createDeptName from cus_month_report a LEFT JOIN cus_dictionary b on a.status=b.id LEFT JOIN sys_user c on a.create_by=c.user_id LEFT JOIN sys_dept d on c.dept_id=d.dept_id WHERE a.id= #{id}

select count(a.id) from ( select id, create_by as createBy, date_format(create_time,'%Y-%m') as createTime, date_format(now(),'%Y-%m') as nowTime from cus_month_report )a where a.createTime =a.nowTime and a.createBy=#{value}
